description: Change a parameter type in a function
oldCode: public type Person function(int x, int y);
newCode: public type Person function(int x , String y);

description: Change a parameter in a function
oldCode: public type Person function(int x, int y);
newCode: public type Person function(int x , String z);

description: Remove a parameter in a function
oldCode: public type Person function(int x, int y);

description: Add a new parameter to the function
oldCode: public type Person function(int x, int y);
newCode: public type Person function(int x , int y , int z);

description: Change the order of a parameter in function
oldCode: public type Person function(int x, String y);
newCode: public type Person function(String y, int x);

description: Add a default value for a required parameter in function definition
newCode: public type Person function( int x =  7);

description: Change the default value parameter as a required parameter in function definition
oldCode: public type Person function( int y = 7);

description: Change the default value parameter to another default value in function definition
Add parameter annotation to a function.
newCode: public type Person function(@untainted string name);

description: Remove parameter annotation from a function.
oldCode: public type Person function(@untainted string name);

description: Modify parameter annotation in a function
oldCode: public type Person function(@untainted string name);
newCode: public type Person function(@tainted string name);
